name: Reading Road Trip
description: Give back on your vacation when you literally go back to school on the Reading Road Trip, a unique opportunity to engage with Caribbean children and enhance their lives as part of our 'Community Routes Program'. Reading a story is just the beginning of this enlightening experience when you are paired with a small group of children, ages 3-10 years old, at their school. Your entertaining questions will keep the kids attentive while at the same time improving their listening and comprehension skills. As these youngsters complete their reading aptitude sheets, your one-on-one help will open a new chapter of renewed excitement about learning. You’ll take home memories of sharing something special from the heart and you can feel free to donate a favorite new or gently used book to the school’s library for the children to enjoy time and time again.
